column5: Beautiful comfortable home in quiet neighborhood. We are offering a private room with queen bed or a private room with a trundle bed. Room with trundle bed has a small TV. They both sleep 2. Right off the I-35. Easy access to Austin and San Antonio. 15 minutes to Austin and 60 minutes to San Antonio. 15 minutes to outlet mall in San Marcos. I have 2 very friendly kitties. I am in and out as I do work 4 days a week. Access to laundry room, and exercise room.
